subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili made a career-high eight 3-pointers and scored a season-high 46 points as the visiting San Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 112-105, on Wednesday night.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili made a career-high eight 3-pointers and scored a season-high 46 points as the visiting San Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 112-105, on Wednesday night.
